General.Name: Salutica Bhd
General.Description: Salutica Berhad, through its subsidiary, Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn. Bhd., manufactures precision plastic parts and components for the electronics industry. The company engages in the design, development, and manufacture of mobile communication products, wireless electronics, and lifestyle devices; consumer and business electronic product, such as Bluetooth stereo headsets, smart watches, and precision light guides for optical touch screen system; and solutions for electronics and plastic manufacturing industries. It also offers hardware and software design services; surface treatment and precision plastic injection services; and single and multi-layer PCBA services. In addition, the company provides Bluetooth smart tire pressure monitoring systems under the FOBO brand. It has operations in the United States, Europe, rest of Asia, Europe, Australia, New Zealand, Oceania, Malaysia, Africa, and the Middle East. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Ipoh, Malaysia. Salutica Berhad is a subsidiary of Blue Ocean Enlightenment Sdn. Bhd.
